title: Lux 1.2: Call to Arms
description: Call to Arms is the second book in the Lux series. Lux Omnibus Volume 1, containing Seeds, Call to Arms, and Alliance is now available from Amazon. *** As America falls, the survivors begin to build an army to fight against the corrupt government of Senator Angine, while the Lux experiment with their abilities and try to come to terms with what they are. ***
author: Jalex Hansen
